regulations.name: Dangerous Goods Regulations (DGR)
regulations.details: Provides guidelines for the safe transport of hazardous materials by air.

regulations.name: Live Animals Regulations (LAR)
regulations.details: Standards for the safe and humane transport of live animals.

regulations.name: Perishable Cargo Regulations (PCR)
regulations.details: Guidelines for handling and transporting perishable goods.

regulations.name: Technical Instructions for the Safe Transport of Dangerous Goods by Air
regulations.details: Comprehensive instructions on transporting dangerous goods safely.

embargoed_items.details: Importation and transit of live birds, and products thereof, from third countries into and through the EU are restricted.
Transport of radioactive materials to, from, and through Italy is prohibited.
Transport of explosives (Class 1), toxic and infectious substances (Class 6), and radioactive materials (Class 7) is restricted.

embargoed_items.item: Shark fins, whale or dolphin meat, fissile material, waste and scrap materials
embargoed_items.details: Transport of shark fins for human consumption, whale or dolphin meat, fissile material, and any type of waste and scrap material is prohibited.

regulations.details: Mandates security measures for all cargo transported on passenger and all-cargo aircraft.
Regulates the transport of hazardous materials and enforces safety standards.

embargoed_countries.details: The U.S. Department of Commerce's Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) enforces sanctions against these countries, restricting exports and reexports.

regulations.details: Implements the Air Cargo Security Program to ensure secure transportation of goods.
Sets standards for the safe transport of goods by air, including dangerous goods regulations.
Oversees air cargo security and the transport of dangerous goods.
Provides regulations for air cargo operations and the transport of dangerous goods within EU member states.

embargoed_countries.details: The European Union maintains a list of embargoed countries with specific trade restrictions.

airlines.details: Temporary embargo on all shipments from these countries to and via the United States due to new security requirements.

embargoed_items.item: Dual-use goods, arms, ammunition, and military equipment
embargoed_items.details: Embargoes on these items to certain countries as specified in their Conditions of Carriage.

embargoed_items.item: Dangerous goods (various classes), live animals, human remains
embargoed_items.details: Embargoes on specific dangerous goods classes and live animals on certain routes.

embargoed_items.item: Explosives, weapons, radioactive materials, live animals
embargoed_items.details: Embargoes on specific items across all lanes, with certain exceptions.
